original_title: Tourists enjoy their visit to the paradise Island
original_body_lines: A group of tourists from overseas are seen strolling around in Colombo city. According to the Tourism Development Authority, more than 100,000 tourists visited  Sri Lanka last month (February). Most of the tourists came from Russia, and a large number of tourists have also come from India, Britain, Germany, France, Australia, Canada, America and Israel. Pix by Pradeep Pathirana
